pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.2_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.5_1: mahāpajāpatiṁ gotamiṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.6_0: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.2_0: “bhagavatā udakasuddhikā anuññātā”ti atigambhīraṁ udakasuddhikaṁ ādiyantī muttakaraṇe vaṇaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.3_0: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ āroceti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.4_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.6_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṁ udakasuddhikaṁ ādiyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.9_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṁ udakasuddhikaṁ ādiyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.11_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.8_0: samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso kesaggamattampi atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
